pageTitle: Intronaut - Habitual Levitations: Instilling Words with Tones (CD) - Amoeba Music

textBeforeTable: Track Listing Metal in spirit, but extraterrestrial math prog in sound and vibe, Intronaut is the guaranteed perfect soundtrack for that special bowl of weed you've been saving. This Los Angeles combo takes the doom and paranoia of classic metal, and stretches them out into kaleidoscopically unfolding experimental jams, with technical but soulful drumming, clean, melodic vocal harmonies and ever-ascending guitar lines. After a stunning debut LP and then a couple of impressive but stilted followups, Habitual Levitations is Intronaut's ass-kicking masterpiece, an album to which you can headbang, work out some equations in fractal geometry, or swim through a river of purple clouds. They are about to commence a tour with the extremely mathtastic Animals As Leaders and the legendarily brutal Meshuggah, which will surely be a summer must-see for true heads. Blast in with Intronaut! 03/18/2013 Amoeba Review Vinyl LP Also available in: SHIPS FREE in U.S. $16.98 BUY Intronaut Habitual Levitations: Instilling Words with Tones (CD) Tweet
